name: B. Subsequence Update
input: InputEach test contains multiple test cases. The first line contains the number of test cases $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \le t \le 10^4$$$). The description of the test cases follows. The first line of each test case contains three integers $$$n$$$, $$$l$$$, $$$r$$$ ($$$1 \le l \le r \le n \le 10^5$$$) — the length of $$$a$$$, and the segment $$$[l,r]$$$.The second line of each test case contains $$$n$$$ integers $$$a_1,a_2,\ldots,a_n$$$ ($$$1 \le a_{i} \le 10^9$$$).It is guaranteed that the sum of $$$n$$$ over all test cases does not exceed $$$10^5$$$.
output: OutputFor each test case, output the minimum value of $$$a_l+a_{l+1}+\ldots+a_{r-1}+a_r$$$ on a separate line.
